list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Disable ARM builds and add targeted build warnings.
ARM builds for JDK, Fiasco, and L4 have been disabled due to the lack of cross-compilation support. Added prominent warnings during build execution to notify users of this limitation. Updated `starship-dev.properties`, modified build logic, and included new IntelliJ configurations.

task.summary:
Set build flags to false and add IntelliJ workspace config
All build-related flags in starship-dev.properties were turned off, likely to disable builds and installations across architectures. Additionally, the IntelliJ IDE workspace configuration file was added to version control, including settings for auto-import, change lists, and task management.

Disable build flags and update build configurations
All build-related flags in `starship-dev.properties` were set to false, disabling builds and installations across architectures. Additional changes include swapping JDK debug level to `fastdebug`, updating Maven plugins, and commenting out the `starship-romfs` module. IntelliJ workspace settings and a `README.md` file were also added to aid development setup and configuration.

Add Maven Wrapper and update build configurations
Integrated Maven Wrapper for consistent builds and added relevant configuration files. Updated Pom.xml to include Maven Wrapper plugin, disabled build flags, commented out the `starship-romfs` module, and adjusted IntelliJ workspace settings to improve developer experience.

Add Maven Wrapper and update build configurations
Integrated Maven Wrapper for consistent builds and added relevant configuration files. Updated Pom.xml to include Maven Wrapper plugin, disabled build flags, commented out the `starship-romfs` module, and adjusted IntelliJ workspace settings to improve developer experience.

Add Maven Wrapper and update build configurations
Integrated Maven Wrapper for consistent builds and added relevant configuration files. Updated Pom.xml to include Maven Wrapper plugin, disabled build flags, commented out the `starship-romfs` module, and adjusted IntelliJ workspace settings to improve developer experience.

Format XML code block in README.md
Updated the XML example in the README to use proper code block formatting with `xml` for better readability and consistency. This ensures the example renders correctly and is easier to follow for users.

Format XML code block in README.md
Updated the XML example in the README to use proper code block formatting with `xml` for better readability and consistency. This ensures the example renders correctly and is easier to follow for users.

Enable ARM and x86_64 builds in starship-dev properties
Updated build flags to enable `ARM` and `x86_64` architecture for Fiasco, L4, and JDK in `starship-dev.properties`. Also added instructions to the README for verifying the configuration and running the build process. Ensured IntelliJ workspace changes are tracked for better project setup management.

Fix incorrect repository URL in README.md
The cloning URL was mistakenly duplicated and invalid. This update ensures the repository can be cloned correctly without confusion.

"Improve README formatting and update property block"
Reformatted README for better readability, including consistent code block formatting and corrected numbering. Updated `.starship/starship-dev.properties` example to use the `properties` code block style for clarity. Removed unnecessary blank lines for a cleaner appearance.

Improve README structure and update formatting details
Enhanced README with expanded sections for features, prerequisites, and usage instructions. Updated `.starship/starship-dev.properties` example for clarity and consistent formatting. Added project structure and troubleshooting sections to guide contributors and users effectively.

Improve README structure and update formatting details
Enhanced README with expanded sections for features, prerequisites, and usage instructions. Updated `.starship/starship-dev.properties` example for clarity and consistent formatting. Added project structure and troubleshooting sections to guide contributors and users effectively.

Disable build flags and add IntelliJ configuration files
All build-related flags in `starship-dev.properties` were turned off to disable builds and installations across architectures. IntelliJ workspace and module configuration files were added to version control for better IDE integration. Minor updates were made to the `README.md` and dependency list to reflect required packages.

Add support for smart clean and improve build logic
Introduced a `SmartCleanMojo` with configurable clean flags for targeted cleanup across modules (Fiasco, L4, JDK). Improved resilience in build processes by handling build failures and setting relevant clean flags dynamically. Updated project settings, POMs, and property files to align with these enhancements.

Add targeted build warnings and simplify clean flag handling
Added prominent warnings during build execution to improve visibility for JDK, Fiasco, and L4 modules. Removed unnecessary boolean parameter from `setCleanFlag` for streamlined usage. Updated IntelliJ configurations and disabled build flags in `starship-dev.properties` for focused development setups.

Add targeted build warnings and simplify clean flag handling
Added prominent warnings during build execution to improve visibility for JDK, Fiasco, and L4 modules. Removed unnecessary boolean parameter from `setCleanFlag` for streamlined usage. Updated IntelliJ configurations and disabled build flags in `starship-dev.properties` for focused development setups.

Disable ARM builds and add targeted build warnings.
ARM builds for JDK, Fiasco, and L4 have been disabled due to the lack of cross-compilation support. Added prominent warnings during build execution to notify users of this limitation. Updated `starship-dev.properties`, modified build logic, and included new IntelliJ configurations.

Disable ARM builds and add targeted build warnings.
ARM builds for JDK, Fiasco, and L4 have been disabled due to the lack of cross-compilation support. Added prominent warnings during build execution to notify users of this limitation. Updated `starship-dev.properties`, modified build logic, and included new IntelliJ configurations.
